name: A Fun Eye Test: Where's The Coin
name_original: A Fun Eye Test: Where's The Coin
description:
This is a great test of your eyes. A coin is covered by the glass. After several random moves, guess where is the coin.

Highlights:
•Addictive gameplay, easy and fun
•Coin’s magic trick
•Great eye training
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center Support
•It’s FREE!!!

Help:
Keep your eyes on the paper cup that contains the coin. When the paper cups stop moving, tap on the paper cup that contains the coin.

Have fun! :-)
